div.p: To Isidotos, of the [first friends and laarchos] from Apollonios [...] from our [...] of the year 21 [...] of the new moon [...] Phibis [...] being [...] with no good behavior [...] him with violence [...] gave a blow [...] in whatever [part of the body], hit me to death. Those who were there [...] For this reason, I give you this [note. I ask,] if it seems right to you, that you order to imprison the [abovementioned man and that you judge] him in hostile manner. [For, if this happens,] I will have obtained protection [from you]. Farewell. Translation: M. Barbiero (via PN)
